summary: This document is a financial statement from Fifth Third Bank for Shocker Holdings LLC, detailing account activity for the period of April 1, 2014, to April 30, 2014. It includes information about account balances, service charges, and criteria for waiving fees.

persons.name: Philip Fintchre
persons.context: Philip Fintchre is identified as the relationship manager for the account at Fifth Third Bank.

keyFacts: The statement covers the account activity for Shocker Holdings LLC for April 2014.
The beginning balance was $19,558.80 and the ending balance was $19,551.80.
A standard monthly service charge of $11.00 was waived due to meeting balance criteria.
The total combined monthly average balance across accounts was $19,577.74.
The document indicates that the business did not spend at least $500 per month on its business credit card.
